    Peer-Reviewed Journal Publications

    Social Interactions in Immersive Environments

    Title: Alone Together, Together Alone: The Effects of Social Context on Nonverbal Behavior in Virtual Reality
    Authors: Han, E., DeVeaux, C., Miller, M. R., Harari, G.M., Hancock, J. T., Ram, N., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: PRESENCE: Virtual and Augmented Reality, 2024 ⭐️
    Title: Presence and Pronouns: An Exploratory Investigation into the Language of Social VR
    Authors: DeVeaux, C., Markowitz, D. M., Han, E., Miller, M. R., Hancock, J. T., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: Journal of Language and Social Psychology, 2024
    Title: The Influence of Spatial Dimensions of Virtual Environments on Individuals and Group Dynamics During Social Interactions
    Authors: Han, E., DeVeaux, C., Hancock, J. T., Ram, N., Harari, G.M., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: Journal of Environmental Psychology, 2024 ⭐️
    Title: Understanding virtual design behaviors: A large-scale analysis of the design process in Virtual Reality
    Authors: Wang, P., Miller, M. R., Han, E., DeVeaux, C., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: Design Studies, 2024
    Title: Exploring the Relationship Between Attribute Discrepancy and Avatar Embodiment in Immersive Social Virtual Reality
    Authors: DeVeaux, C., Han, E., Landay, J.A., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: Cyberpsychology, Behavior, and Social Networking, 2023
    Title: People, Places, and Time: A Large-scale, Longitudinal Study of Transformed Avatars and Environmental Context in Group Interaction in the Metaverse
    Authors: Han, E., Miller, M. R., DeVeaux, C., Jun, H., Nowak, K.L., Hancock, J. T., Ram, N., & Bailenson, J. N.
    Publisher & Year: Journal of Computer-Mediated Communication, 2023 ⭐️
